title: China Walking a Tightrope With Russia’s War
itunes:title: China Walking a Tightrope With Russia’s War
description:
Dexter “Tiff” Roberts, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council's Asia Security Initiative and author of The Myth of Chinese Capitalism, discusses what China stands to gain, and lose, with Russia's invasion of Ukraine. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Kurt Wagner shares the details of his Businessweek Magazine story Meta’s Russia Problem Is Up to Clegg, Not Zuckerberg, to Solve. And we Drive to the Close with Liz Ann Sonders, Chief Investment Strategist at Charles Schwab.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
